headline: Dollar Tree, Inc. Appoints William W. Douglas III as Member of the Audit and Compensation Committees and Timothy A. Johnson as Member of the Finance and Sustainability and Corporate Social Responsibility Committees, Effective June 19, 2025

headline: Is Dollar Tree a Buy, Sell, or Hold in 2025?
summary: Shares of Dollar Tree have rallied amid solid sales trends at the start of 2025.  The company is selling off its struggling Family Dollar brand as part of a broader restructuring effort.  Dollar Tree (NASDAQ: DLTR) is making a lot of cents for its investors.
